name: session-start-warning
description: Warn when on main/master branch, check if behind remote, and prompt init for new projects

hooks.command:
source "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/lib/branch-utils.sh"; if ! is_kickstart_initialized; then printf '
üöÄ Welcome to Kickstart!

This project will be initialized automatically when you send your first message.
'; fi; branch=$(get_branch); repo=$(get_repo); if is_main_branch "$branch"; then git fetch origin "$branch" --quiet 2>/dev/null; behind=$(git rev-list --count HEAD..origin/"$branch" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$behind" -gt 0 ]; then printf '
‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: You are on %s and %s commits behind origin!

Pull latest before creating a worktree:

  git pull origin %s
  %s

' "$branch" "$behind" "$branch" "$(worktree_message "$branch" "$repo")"; else printf '
‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: You are on the %s branch!

%s

' "$branch" "$(worktree_message "$branch" "$repo")"; fi; fi
